title: India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard
text: February 16, 2018 / 5:37 PM / Updated 25 minutes ago India in South Africa 2018 Scoreboard   Feb 16 (OPTA) - Scoreboard at close of play of 6th odi between South Africa and India on Friday at Centurion, South Africa India win by 8 wickets South Africa 1st innings Aiden Markram c Shreyas Iyer b Shardul Thakur 24 Hashim Amla c MS Dhoni b Shardul Thakur 10 AB de Villiers b Yuzvendra Chahal 30 Khaya Zondo c Hardik Pandya b Yuzvendra Chahal 54 Heinrich Klaasen c Virat Kohli b Jasprit Bumrah 22 Farhaan Behardien c Jasprit Bumrah b Shardul Thakur 1 Chris Morris c Shikhar Dhawan b Kuldeep Yadav 4 Andile Phehlukwayo c&b Shardul Thakur 34 Morne Morkel c Shreyas Iyer b Hardik Pandya 20 Imran Tahir c Virat Kohli b Jasprit Bumrah 2 Lungi Ngidi Not Out 0 Extras 0b 0lb 0nb 0pen 3w 3 Total (46.5 overs) 204 all out Fall of Wickets : 1-23 Amla, 2-43 Markram, 3-105 de Villiers, 4-135 Klaasen, 5-136 Behardien, 6-142 Morris, 7-151 Zondo, 8-187 Morkel, 9-192 Tahir, 10-204 Phehlukwayo Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Shardul Thakur 8.5 0 52 4 5.89 3w Jasprit Bumrah 8 1 24 2 3.00 Hardik Pandya 10 0 39 1 3.90 Kuldeep Yadav 10 0 51 1 5.10 Yuzvendra Chahal 10 0 38 2 3.80 India 1st innings Shikhar Dhawan c Khaya Zondo b Lungi Ngidi 18 Rohit Sharma c Heinrich Klaasen b Lungi Ngidi 15 Virat Kohli Not Out 129 Ajinkya Rahane Not Out 34 Extras 4b 1lb 0nb 0pen 5w 10 Total (32.1 overs) 206-2 Fall of Wickets : 1-19 Sharma, 2-80 Dhawan Did Not Bat : Iyer, Pandya, Dhoni, Thakur, Yadav, Bumrah, Chahal Bowling Ov Md Rn Wk Econ Ex Morne Morkel 7 0 42 0 6.00 2w Lungi Ngidi 8 1 54 2 6.75 3w Chris Morris 6 0 36 0 6.00 Andile Phehlukwayo 4 0 27 0 6.75 Imran Tahir 7.1 0 42 0 5.86 Umpire Aleem Dar Umpire Shaun George Video Ian Gould Match Referee Andrew Pycroft
